p: The factory should be kept clean and free of insects and rodents, and the factory and workshop should be disinfected in a timely manner. Ultraviolet irradiation for 30 min and above can be used. Chlorine dioxide (20 g/m 3, 100–200 mg/kg), 0.1% benzalkonium bromide + 3% bleach powder, 3% sodium hydroxide or NaClO (400–500 mg/kg) solution should be used for spray disinfection.
